channel.title: CVE Feed for Autodesk -- Autodesk AutoCAD LT
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Autodesk -- Autodesk AutoCAD LT

item.title: CVE-2019-7358|2024-08-04T20:46:46.191Z -- autodesk -- autodesk%20autocad%20lt
item.description: An exploitable heap overflow vulnerability in the DXF-parsing functionality in Autodesk Advance Steel 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Architecture 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Electrical 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Map 3D 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Mechanical 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD MEP 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD P&ID 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD Plant 3D 2018, Autodesk AutoCAD LT 2018, and Autodesk Civil 3D 2018. A specially crafted DXF file may cause a heap overflow, resulting in code execution.
